author_name: K O D O T H
html:
When you buy a coin when you get suggestions do you normally do full DD and take notes or skip cz thinking it does result in middle curving ?

Thus it will result in missing the gains ?

If it is the latter be very careful at some point things will turn around !

Build a system pic.twitter.com/HKUPBsJodN

— K O D O T H (@KODOTHH) December 7, 2023
